name: Crowned Heads - Tennessee Waltz - Robusto
additionalNotes: A bold and flavorful cigar with notes of wood, leather, sweetness, spice and dried fruit. It sports a dark USA Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper on top of a premium Nicaraguan binder and filler. Handmade in Nicaragua at the My Father Cigars factory, the Tennessee Waltz is a regional release cigar that honors the state of Tennessee, which is home to Crowned Heads.
